original_text: They said that God's special Messiah would have much pain and he would die. But God would raise him up to be alive again. He would be the first dead person to become alive and not die again. In that way, he would show God's message and bring light to people. He would save both Jewish people and Gentiles. That is what the prophets and Moses wrote. And I say the same thing.’
korean_text: 곧 그리스도가 고난을 받으실 것과 죽은 자 가운데서 먼저 다시 살아나사 이스라엘과 이방인들에게 빛을 전하시리라 함이니이다 하니라

sentences.original_text: They said that God's special Messiah would have much pain
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 말하길 하나님의 특별한 메시아가 큰 고통을 받을 것이라고

sentences.original_text: But God would raise him up to be alive again.
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 하나님은 그를 다시 살아나게 하실 것이라

sentences.original_text: He would be the first dead person to become alive
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 죽은 자들 중에서 처음으로 살아나는 사람이 될 것이라

sentences.original_text: In that way, he would show God's message
sentences.korean_translation: 그런 식으로 그는 하나님의 메시지를 보여줄 것이라
그리고 사람들에게 빛을 가져다 줄 것이라

sentences.original_text: He would save both Jewish people and Gentiles.
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 유대인과 이방인 모두를 구원할 것이라

sentences.original_text: That is what the prophets and Moses wrote.
And I say the same thing.
